programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: Deep inside the most secure bank in America, three desperate women from very different worlds cook up the most unlikely heist of the century: Smuggle out millions of dollars in worn-out currency headed for a Federal Reserve shredder every day.

programme.title: The Brothers Bloom
programme.desc: When conman Stephen tells his brother Bloom he no longer wants to be apart of any criminal schemes, he is persuaded to work on one last job conning a beautiful young heiress out of her cash.

programme.title: Fatal Beauty
programme.desc: Whoopi Goldberg stars as a witty, street-smart L.A. narcotics cop who goes undercover to investigate a poisoned drug shipment in this explosive, romantic action-comedy. Co-stars Sam Elliott.

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: Deep inside the most secure bank in America, three desperate women from very different worlds cook up the most unlikely heist of the century: Smuggle out millions of dollars in worn-out currency headed for a Federal Reserve shredder every day.

programme.title: Blue Valentine
programme.desc: Oscar®-nominees Ryan Gosling (THE NOTEBOOK) and Michelle Williams (BROKEBACK MOUNTAIN) star in BLUE VALENTINE, a story of love found and love lost told in moments past and present.

programme.title: Dr. G Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Wounded" - A teen is eating breakfast when his dad starts stabbing himself. As the investigation unfolds, police begin to doubt the story. Dr. G must determine if this was a suicide or a murder.

programme.title: Dr. G Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Hidden Killers" - When Marie Allen visits her sister, she makes a gruesome discovery: the 49-year-old is dead on the couch. Now, it's up to Dr. G to figure out if this was an accident or something sinister.

programme.title: Dr. G Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Playing With Fire" - Dr. Farley discusses the bizarre case of a pregnant mother who suddenly dies. As the autopsy unfolds, Dr. Farley uncovers information that could have saved her and her unborn child's life.

programme.title: Dr. G Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Deadly Bite" - Roy Cambells is found dead and covered with scratches, his aggressive 80lb dog by his side. Dr. G wonders if the dog could have been responsible for the man's death.

programme.title: Dr. G Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Deadly Circumstances" - Dario Romano is found dead by his son at the bottom of the attic ladder. What happened to this 45-year-old? With Dr. G's guidance, Dr. Stephany must solve the mystery.

programme.title: Dr. G Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Fatal Encounters" - Keith Douglas is met with a barrage of bullets as he opens his door. The police are looking to Dr. G for hard evidence to link certain suspects to the murder.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Redemption" - An 82-year-old woman appears to have committed suicide by overdosing on painkillers, but Dr. G finds evidence that suggests that she may have died of a heart attack.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Hit and Run" - Dr. G preforms an autopsy on an alleged hit-and-run victim but finds no evidence of vehicular injury on the 41-year-old man's body. Could his alcoholism have had a role in his death?

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "The Mystery of the Haunted Crossing" - In August of 1995, when Dr. G worked in Texas, a pile of human bones was found at a supposedly haunted railroad crossing. Dr. G was able to determine the age but not the sex.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "The Chain of Life and Death" - A 94-year-old woman dies in the hospital after having a convulsion. The case becomes the business of the medical examiner's office when no one will sign her death certificate.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Who is Watching the Children?" - An infant and his two-year-old sister are found dead in a house shared by two families. At first, they are believed to have died from either carbon monoxide poisoning or cold medicine overdoses.

programme.title: Portlandia:Open Relationship
programme.desc: Doug & Claire try an open relationship. A company uses VR for an important meeting. The Mayor waits for a helicopter. Fred steps on a snail.

programme.title: Portlandia:You Do You
programme.desc: Sandra discovers she can have it all. Portland adds more lanes to the freeway. Kath & Dave learn the art of taking photo booth pictures.

programme.title: Portlandia:Most Pro City
programme.desc: The Mayor sets out to prove Portland's diversity. Text message drama unfolds during a business meeting. Activists on a hunger strike take a cheat day.

programme.title: Portlandia:Peter Follows P!nk
programme.desc: Peter & Nance interact with celebs on social media. James rides his bike to work. Gil & George say Oh, Hello to Toni & Candace.

programme.title: Portlandia:Long Way Back
programme.desc: The Weirdos lose their trash can, which takes an unexpected journey throughout the city. Malcolm & Kris visit a pediatrician. Fred & Carrie just give up.

programme.title: Portlandia:Rose Route
programme.desc: The Mayor cuts deals all over town to secure the perfect route for the Portland Marathon. Fred & Carrie decide to run to break their addiction to news alerts.

programme.title: Portlandia:Farm
programme.desc: A bohemian couple goes to great lengths to make sure that their restaurant order is ethical and humane. Guest starring Steve Buscemi and Jason Sudeikis.

programme.title: Portlandia:A Song for Portland
programme.desc: Fred and Carrie meet the Mayor of Portland who gives them a special assignment. Special Guest Star Kyle MacLachlan. Also guest starting Aubrey Plaza and Sam Adams.

programme.title: Portlandia:Aimee
programme.desc: Fred and Carrie discover that their maid is none other than their favorite singer-songwriter Aimee Mann. Guest Starring Aimee Mann and Sarah McLachlan.

programme.title: Portlandia:Mayor is Missing
programme.desc: When the Mayor goes missing, Fred and Carrie begin a frantic search for him. Special Guest Star Kyle MacLachlan. Also guest starring Edie McClurg, Aubrey Plaza, Kumail Nanjiani and Sam Adams.

programme.title: Portlandia:Blunderbuss
programme.desc: All of Portlandia is swept up in the excitement of a new music and film festival. Guest starring Selma Blair, Jenny Conlee, Colin Meloy, James Mercer, Corin Tucker and Gus Van Sant.

programme.title: Portlandia:Baseball
programme.desc: The Mayor turns to Fred and Carrie to help him put together a big league baseball team. Special Guest Star Kyle MacLachlan. Also guest starring Heather Graham and Nick Kroll.

programme.title: Portlandia:Mixologist
programme.desc: Fred and Carrie learn about the art of mixology and love as they venture outside of Portland on a quest. Guest stars Andy Samberg, Kumail Nanjiani.

programme.title: Portlandia:One Moore Episode
programme.desc: Doug & Claire watch a box set of Battlestar Galactica which becomes an obsession that takes over their lives. Guest Stars Jeff Goldblum, Eddie Vedder.

programme.title: Portlandia:Winter in Portlandia
programme.desc: It's wintertime in Portlandia. Peter and Nance struggle to keep off winter weight by cutting pasta from their diets. Candace's son (Bobby Moynihan) visits Women and Women First bookstore for the holidays.

programme.title: Portlandia:Take Back MTV
programme.desc: In this Season 3 premiere, Spyke & Iris join forces with a gang of former MTV stars to take back MTV from the Tweens. A group of frustrated college grads stage a protest on the dance floor. Sandra has a crush on a man in her meditation class.

programme.title: Portlandia:Missionaries
programme.desc: The Mayor sends Fred and Carrie on a door-to-door mission to Seattle to recruit new citizens for Portland. A pedicab driver hustles for clients. Peter and Nance prepare for the opening of their Bed and Breakfast with a visit to The Doily Shoppe.

programme.title: Portlandia:Nina's Birthday
programme.desc: Nina goes to great lengths to throw an extravagant 32nd birthday party for herself. The daylong event is set to include activities ranging from horseback rides to sunrise yoga that will last well into the night.

programme.title: Portlandia:Aquiggleman
programme.desc: Concerned parents Brendan and Michelle start a band that makes kids music. The Portland Nerd Council issues a Public Service Announcement. Malcolm & Kris have an uncomfortable lunch at a vegan restaurant. The Feminist Bookstore hosts a comedy night.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Scott Novotny - A Trip to Goofyville
programme.desc: Scott Novotny brings his high-energy goofyness to the live audience at VidAngel Studios.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Karen Morgan - Go Dawgs!
programme.desc: A former trial attorney, she moved from the courtroom to comedy after being selected as a Finalist on Nickelodeon TV’s Search for the Funniest Mom in America.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Josh Blue - The Disabled List
programme.desc: Following his groundbreaking win on NBC’s Last Comic Standing in 2006, Josh Blue has risen through the ranks to become a well-established headliner at venues throughout the world.

programme.title: Steve Soelberg - WE SAY BIM
programme.desc: Extremely funny comedian and overall nice person Steve Soelberg brings an observational, story telling style of comedy which has repeatedly left his regularly sold out audiences in stitches. Whether he's relating the experiences of growing up in a large family in Seattle, Washington or recounting the time he saw an angry guy in a tutu at a Ragnar relay, he has a way of making each audience member feel as if they were just the person he wanted to tell the story to because he knew they'd enjoy it just as much as he did. Due to his growing popularity as a comedian, he has appeared multiple times on local TV affiliates (Fox, KUTV, and KSL), on the radio, and has entertained tens of thousands traveling the country not only as comedian, but also as the voice of the Ragnar relay races as their race announcer and emcee. Steve's positive, upbeat personality paired with his observational, often self deprecating humor and his ability to appeal to a broad audience guarantee his shows will be a hilarious and memorable experience for all those who attend.

programme.title: Taylor Mason - Hysterical Perspective
programme.desc: Taylor Mason is your average, run-of-the-mill writer, performer, singer-songwriter, ventriloquist, comedian, entertainer, rock’n’roller, puppeteer, pianist, entertainer, and is here now for Dry Bar Comedy.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Phil Kopczynski - Full Grown Man
programme.desc: Phil Kopczynski is a reluctant nice guy and father who just wants to occasionally play in the wilderness and regularly make city-dwellers laugh.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Kortney Shane Williams - Unsubstantiated
programme.desc: The master of satire has been a part of The Bridgetown Comedy Festival, Boston Comedy Festival, Laughing Skull Comedy Festival, and Bumbershoot Arts festival. Kortney’s self-deprecating humor has won him finalist spots in both Comedy Central’s South Beach Comedy Festival Competition and NBC’s Stand-Up Showcase.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Andrew Sleighter - Breakfast Stealer
programme.desc: Andrew Sleighter started in comedy looking for the perfect funny line to open a biography. Since then, Andrewís laid-back style and clever writing has won him appreciation from fans and respect from his peers. A regular at colleges and comedy clubs across the country, Andrewís also performed at some of the most prestigious comedy festivals in and out of the country including Bumbershoot, Bridgetown, The Cabo Comedy Festival, The Aspen Comedy Festival, Laughing Skull, and the Johnny Carson Great American Comedy Festival. Andrew wrote and blogged for the Sports Show with Norm Macdonald on Comedy Central and was a regular on the MTV prank show Money From Strangers. Heís performed on Nuvo TVís Stand Up & Deliver, Last Comic Standing, and made his late-night stand-up debut on Conan. Andrewís comedy has the ability to reach wide ranges of audiences and works in a diversity of rooms. Reliable and consistent, he rarely ends a show by lighting the stage on fire out of rage. Most importantly, heís constantly fascinated by and eager to keep learning about stand-up.

programme.title: Cash Levy - Game of Chance
programme.desc: If you missed Cash on Fox Sports or haven't bought his newly released comedy CD, Extemporaneous, you're probably familiar with seeing his act on Comedy Central, Fox Sports, NBC, The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson (CBS), Comics Unleashed, Just For Laughs Toronto, Moontowers Comedy Festival, Comedy.TV. and the Hollywood Improv. Ifyou haven't had time to watch you may have heard Cash on SiriusXM or as a regular guest on The Bob and Tom Show. Internationally, Cash has performed for U.S. troops all over the world, from Afghanistan to Singapore. Recently he wrote for the Critics Choice Awards.Cash Levy is known as one of the finest improvisers in the country, so you might enjoy his Podcast, "Cashing in With T.J. MIller" or his newest one-hour comedy special "Crowd Control". Come see why the Denver Post called Cash Levy's show "Refreshingly unrehearsed, this is what live comedy is all about."

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Chelle T - It Just Got Real
programme.desc: As a mother of seven, Chelle T has seen it all, and shes not afraid to joke about it. Quippy and honest, Chelle T talks about how children are raised differently these days, menopause, being married for twenty-three years, and how desperate you sometimes become when youre a mom in this special.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Brian Bates - Uber Important
programme.desc: Turning to comedy after twenty years in corporate America, Brian Bates jokes about ubering his hecklers home, meeting women while hiking, and people who dont believe in God but do believe in wrestling.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Jeff Capri - Capricious
programme.desc: Jeff Capri uses his cynical perspective to riff on oxygen bars, playing darts to get in shape, and men taking their shirts off before fights.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Maija DiGiorgio - Maija Pinion
programme.desc: Born to a black mother and an Italian father in New York City, Maija Digiorgios comedy centers on the examination of her own mixed-race identity. Digiorgio riffs on Thanksgiving with each side of her family, gender roles between the two cultlures, and her racist grandma in this special.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Brad Trackman - Thanks
programme.desc: Brad Trackman is a national touring comedian who has been featured on a number of well-known comedy shows and channels.

But as the reporters start their private tour, they get the feeling that the resort may not be as safe as Delos claims...

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Best of: Special Connections'' - Being pack animals, dogs possess an instinctual need to bond... but some bonds run deeper than others. To honor "man's best friend", we look back at some of this season's most heartwarming and inspirational connections.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Atlas'' - Let freedom ring! Brandon thinks a black German shepherd has what it takes to become a service dog. But is one-year-old Atlas ready to shoulder the needs of a disabled veteran?

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Charlotte'' - When a Heeler/Chihuahua Mix loses her front leg due to neglect, Brandon steps in to give her a second chance. But preparing this special needs dog for a new life means teaching her to embrace her new body and finding her an equally "special" new home.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Spirit'' - A street smart stray could strike the right chord with a rock n' roll family. But even if Brandon takes Spirit off the street, can he take the street out of Spirit?

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Patches'' - A timid Chihuahua/Min Pin mix presents Brandon with an unexpected obstacle as he works to train her to become an emotional support dog.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Ollie'' - A retired couple reaches out to Brandon in hopes of finding a dog that will help them stay active in their daily fight against Parkinson's disease. But keeping this terrier's energy under control means channeling Teri's natural instincts into agility.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Teri'' - A middle-aged underdog gets a second chance with an empty nester looking to spread her own wings. But will a history of neglect keep Ollie from embracing his adventurous new life?

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Olive'' - Brandon trains a four-year-old poodle mix to work alongside a child advocate in the Missouri court system. But until Olive can prove she has the right temperament for the job, the jury remains out on her adoption.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Buddy'' - A newlywed couple decides to jumpstart their new life together by rescuing a puppy. But before Brandon says "I do" to this adoption, he'll need to get Buddy's unacceptable puppy habits under control.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Luna'' - Brandon rescues a fun-loving German Shepherd that was found as a stray. But the dog's boundless energy threatens to be a deal breaker for a woman who was injured while walking an out of control Shepherd in the past.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Sheela'' - An Australian cattle dog mix seems like the perfect companion for an adventurous couple looking to embrace their retirement. But Brandon will need to work overtime to get Sheela's energy level under control.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Pax'' - My fair lady! A young couple reaches out to Brandon in hopes of finding a playmate for their current dog. But before Pax can officially move in, she'll need to trade in her street habits for home etiquette.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Home Improvement'' - Even during some major construction at the Lucky Dog Ranch, Charlotte, Spirit, and three other dogs undergo life-changing renovations of their own.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Bear'' - Big dogs often present unique training challenges, but the difficulty is compounded for Brandon when he is tasked with matching a high-energy Great Dane with a small-statured adopter.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Cosmo'' - While a new family transforms their home to welcome a Yorkie mix, Brandon discovers a dark truth about the dog's past that changes the course of its training.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Lolly'' - A Maltese mix appears to be an ideal lapdog for a senior, but the dog's boundless energy makes preparing it for retirement living a lot of work for Brandon.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Bean'' - When a Spaniel mix poses a unique opportunity for a high school student to develop her talents, Brandon realizes that won't happen if he can't get the dog under control.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Two's Company'' - Some of Brandon's rescued pups find additional purpose, and extra challenges, when they are paired with other dogs.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Dakota'' - Before a rescued Malamute mix can provide comfort to a teenager with anxiety, Brandon must first help the dog overcome his own emotional issues.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Aussie'' - Before he can find a new home for a Golden Retriever-Collie mix that was surrendered by his previous family, Brandon must help the dog overcome separation anxiety.

programme.title: Lucky Dog

programme.title: Qias Omar vs HesKicks In A Sneaker Battle From Home! | #LIFEATCOMPLEX
programme.desc: On this episode of Sneaker Battle From Home, we pit two "Shoetubers" against one another. They both started their respective channels back in 2012, Heskicks vs Qias Omar, is a battle of old school collecting versus new school hype! The two put on a display of versatility for the public in an incredible 5 round battle! Make sure you watch and debate for yourself on who won this battle!

programme.title: Lavar Ball vs Jacques Slade In A Sneaker Battle From Home | #LIFEATCOMPLEX
programme.desc: On this episode of #LIFEATCOMPLEX Presents Sneaker Battle, we managed to put on the most unexpected pairing to date! In one corner, he is an OG to the Sneaker Youtube space, some would consider him the Godfather of sneaker unboxing videos, @Jacques Slade aka Kustoo is here to battle! His opponent is the undefeated one, this man NEVER LOST a single competition of any sort in his life, Lavar Ball is here to battle! Watch the battle and let us know who won this matchup!

programme.title: Watch King Combs Choose Between Drake & Pusha T for Best Rapper of the Decade | Complex Brackets
programme.desc: Complex Brackets is a new game show from Complex News where your favorite celebs choose the best rapper in any one of these four categories: Best East Coast Rapper, Best West Coast Rapper, Best Rapper of the Decade, and Best Rapper of All Time. In this episode, King Combs hits a wall when he has to choose between Drake and Pusha T for the crown of Best Rapper of the Decade. Be sure to check out Complex Brackets every Monday at 2:00pm EST right here on Complex News.

programme.title: Moneybagg Yo Crowns The Best Rapper of the Decade | Complex Brackets
programme.desc: The Dirty South dominates throughout this episode when Moneybagg Yo sticks to his roots as he goes through our Best Rapper of the Decade bracket. The Memphis rapper delivered upset after upset while being faced with tough choices between hip hop giants and rappers who spoke to his life growing up. Make sure you share your choices in the comments below. Would you have picked the same?

programme.title: James Harden Rocks Louis Vuitton and Chris Paul Reps Black-Owned Brands | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: On the latest "Tunnel Takedown," hosts Kalysse Anthony, Mouse Jones and Racks Hogan can't agree on Russell Westbrook's latest look and break down why James Harden's Louis Vuitton outfit missed the mark. Then, we shout out Chris Paul for his support of black designers, and Racks explains how to tell the difference between an original vintage t-shirt and a reproduction.

programme.title: Kiana Ledé Explains Her "Chocolate" Video
programme.desc: Check out the sixth episode featuring Kiana Ledé, as she reveals to us why she decided to do a FaceTime video for her track "Chocolate", her love for "Sex in the City" reruns and her competitiveness in Monopoly Deal. Also check out her latest album "KIKI," available now!

programme.title: The Perfect New York Slice with Frank Pinello and Michael Imperioli | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: In New York City, pizza isn't just food, it's a way of life. But which iconic NY-style dish reigns supreme: the Sicilian square or the classic round pie? In the series premiere of Pizza Wars, host Nicole Russell faces off against Best Pizza's Frank Pinello to find out which slice is the true king of New York. And who better to judge the event than legendary actor and pizza obsessive Michael Imperioli?

programme.title: Binging with Babish Judges Movie-Inspired Pizzas: Nicole Russell vs Mike Greenfield | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: Which movie-inspired pizza reigns supreme: the broccoli-topped pie from Inside Out, or "pizza in a cup" from The Jerk? As host Nicole Russell continues her quest to become the world's next master pizza-maker, Binging with Babish has challenged her and Pro Home Cooks' Mike Greenfield to take his silver-screen recreations to the next level. Will Nicole's Cup O' Pizza earn her a much-needed victory following a tough loss to Frank Pinello in Episode 1?

programme.title: The Ultimate Viral Pizza Showdown with Mike Hauke, Mark Iacono, and Scott Wiener | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: Ramen, tacos, cheeseburgers, fried chicken-Mike Hauke of Tony Boloney's can turn just about anything into a pizza. But has the undisputed king of Instagramable pies finally met his match? In a brand new episode of Pizza Wars, host Nicole Russell attempts to wrestle the crown from Dr. Franken-slice in a viral pizza showdown for the ages. Will Nicole's popcorn-crusted bar pie be enough to topple Mike's bone-in "Flaming Cowboy"? Only pizza pros Mark Iacono and Scott Wiener can decide.

programme.title: Sean Evans and Farideh Sadeghin Taste Test Chicago Deep Dish Made by Two New Yorkers | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: Can two thin-crust loving New Yorkers make deep dish pizza fit for a Chicago native? As host Nicole Russell continues her quest to become the world's next master pizza maker she must face off against Josephine Giordano of Lenny's Pizza to see if she can conquer the Windy City's most controversial culinary export. Will Nicole's chicken parm-packed deep dish be enough to the win the favor of Muchies' Farideh Sadeghin and Chicago native Sean Evans?

programme.title: The Perfect Detroit-Style Pizza with Cliff Skighwalker, Adam Richman, and Reina Scully | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: Detroit is home to some of America's most delicious pizza. But who can create the ultimate Motor City-inspired slice? As host Nicole Russell continues her quest to become the world's next master pizza-maker, she must face off against chef Cliff Skighwalker in a good ol' fashioned pan-pizza throwdown.

programme.title: Mythical Chef Josh and Nicole Russell Make Taco Bell and Beef Patty Inspired Pizzas | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: Pizza is the ultimate blank canvas for culinary innovation. In this episode of Pizza Wars, host Nicole Russell faces off against Mythical Chef Josh to see who can create the ultimate "mashup pie." At Mythical Kitchen, Josh has perfected the art of fast-food fusion, but will his Doritos Locos Taco Pizza be enough to take down Nicole's Jamaican beef patty-inspired pie? The choice is up to this week's judges: Complex's Speedy Morman and chef Jae Lee of Nowon in NYC.

programme.title: An Open Conversation about Kanye West
programme.desc: On this episode Complex staffers, Khal and Jinx, weigh in on Kanye's media takeover, from his interview with Charlamagne Tha God, his appearance on TMZ, and his current state of mind.

programme.title: Joji Judges a Boba Tea Battle Between Rich Brian and NIKI
programme.desc: Boba is one of the world's most beloved beverages. But what happens when NIKI and Rich Brian decide to trick out their drinks with some crazy toppings? After learning the bubble-tea basics from Boba Guys founder Bin Chen, NIKI and Brian go head-to-head in the boba battle of the century. Gummy bears? Check. Gushers? Check. Pop Rocks? Check! The only thing keeping NIKI and Brian from achieving bubble tea perfection is the limits of their own imaginations.

programme.title: Joji and Rich Brian Make International Burgers with Chef Ludo
programme.desc: Last year, chef Ludo Lefebvre taught Joji and Rich Brian how to make the perfect omelet. But can the boys finally impress their mentor by serving him a couple of tasty burgers? After learning the secrets behind Le Big Mec-Ludo's legendary French-twist on a double cheeseburger-Brian and Joji go head-to-head in an international burger battle for the ages. Which burger will Ludo choose: Brian's satay-and-sambal-slathered creation, or Joji's teriyaki-and-shrimp-topped monstrosity?

programme.title: Racks Most Expensive Supreme Purchase & Air Jordan 4 Levi's!
programme.desc: On this episode Tony sits down with Racks and answer some view questions. Racks shares his most expensive Supreme purchase and break down his thoughts on the Nike Zoom Fly Mercurial sneakers and the Air Jordan 4 Levi's in the black and white colorway.

programme.title: The Ultimate Regional Burger Road Trip with a Burger Scholar
programme.desc: Burger Scholar George Motz and Alvin Cailan are going on the ultimate regional burger road trip-which includes a pit stop to eat America's original hamburger. Motz is a veteran road warrior: he's logged thousands of miles in his car chasing down burgers all over the country.

programme.title: South LA's African American Taco Movement
programme.desc: Miss Info meets a group of young, charismatic African-American entrepreneurs from Watts, South L.A, and Compton who are shaking up the taco scene, finding new meaning in L.A.'s iconic street food. Find out how upstarts like All Flavor No Grease and Taco Mell are making a name for themselves, and why rapper Casey Veggies says, "The food game turned into the rap game."

programme.title: Joji and Sean Evans Review Japanese Snacks
programme.desc: Joji is here to help Sean Evans navigate the often overwhelming world of the Japanese convenience store. Born and raised in Japan, the 88rising crooner takes our host on a snack-fueled journey through the Land of the Rising Sun.

programme.title: How New Orleans Birthed a Vietnamese Po Boy Movement
programme.desc: We head to New Orleans. Forty years ago, Vietnamese migration to NOLA introduced bánh mì to po' boy country. Now, the lines between two iconic sandwiches are blurring. To find out what happens when you mash up the Mississippi Delta and the Mekong Delta, we spoke to New Orleans legend Curren$y, Times-Picayune writer Brett Anderson, and Banh Mi Boys chef Peter Nguyen.

programme.title: Mike Chen and Claire Saffitz Explore Japanese Street Food and Candy
programme.desc: Japan Village is a 20,000-square-foot food hall in Brooklyn's Industry City, and Reina Scully is ready to explore every corner. But no food tour is complete without a few friends. Joining Reina on her adventure is Strictly Dumpling's Mike Chen, Bon Appétit's Claire Saffitz, and NYC restaurateur Sakura Yagi.

programme.title: Wagyu 101 with Sean Evans and Philip DeFranco
programme.desc: Japan is home to some of the world's most coveted cuts of meat. But what makes wagyu so expensive? From an $85 wagyu sando with Hot Ones host Sean Evans, to a $350 wagyu steak with her old boss Philip DeFranco, Reina Scully is eating her way through NYC's most decadent hunks of Japanese beef with a couple of friends. But what gives wagyu its famously marbled fat? And what's the deal with American wagyu popping up at restaurants?

programme.title: WWE Star Asuka Eats Japanese Eel
programme.desc: Eel is one of the most traditional ingredients in Japanese cooking. But in the U.S., the delicacy is still largely misunderstood. On this episode of Gochi Gang, Reina Scully is embarking on an eel-eating adventure. First, Chef Hiroki Fukushima gives Reina a crash course in the preparation of unagi, or freshwater eel, at Unagi Aburi Ittetsu. And later, Reina teams up with WWE superstar and sushi obsessive Asuka for an omakase experience centered around anago, unagi's saltwater cousin.

programme.title: Frank Pinello and Mark Iacono Eat "Japanese Pasta"
programme.desc: Last week, Reina Scully ate her way through three of Japan's most recognizable ramen styles. But today, she's on a mission to see where ramen is going next. Her first stop is Niche, where chefs Frank Pinello, Mark Iacono, Carlo Carciotto, and Anthony Vitolo are ready to try mazemen, a saucy, brothless style of ramen. Chef Shigetoshi "Jack" Nakamura calls this dish "Japanese pasta"-but will his cheese and bacon-topped noodles satisfy some of NYC's most beloved Italian-American chefs?

programme.title: Meek Mill & Lil Baby Albums, Jay Explains 'What's Free' Line, Em's 'Kick Off'
programme.desc: Nadeska, Wayno and DJ Akademiks review the latest projects released by Meek Mill and Lil Baby. After dropping 'Wins & Loses' in 2017, Meek returned last week with the release of his fourth studio album, 'Championships.' The new LP, which features a star-studded line-up of guest appearances, is highlighted by the Jay-Z and Rick Ross-assisted track, "What's Free," as well as the Drake and Meek collab joint "Going Bad.

programme.title: Kanye Still Obsessing About Drake, Bobby Shmurda Dropping a Tape From Prison?
programme.desc: On Tuesday's (Jan. 28) episode of #EverydayStruggle, Nadeska, Wayno and DJ Akademiks continue to mourn the loss of legendary basketball player Kobe Bryant, and his 13-year-old daughter Gianna Bryant. The crew shares the latest updates of the helicopter accident investigation, and also speak on 50 Cent announcing that Kobe's death has made him a changed man.

programme.title: Showtime: A Coming Of Age Football Story
programme.desc: A powerful story of the 2019 Parkway North Junior Vikings 8th Grade Team as they strive to become 3 time champions. Despite their differences while learning life lessons through the game of football join together as one team, one vision, one community.

programme.title: Persianality
programme.desc: In this Revry Original series, hilarity ensues when married couple Bijan and Fereshteh Shoorkhakianian visit Palm Springs. Whether it's sitting by the pool, eating dinner, or getting a couple's massage - there's no denying that this love is lavish.

programme.title: The Millennial Experience
programme.desc: The Millennial Experience is one part dance-for-film and one part documentary. The film explores cultural appropriation vs appreciation, LGBTQIA+ culture, feminism and how these topics impact the Millennial generation. The dance sequences in the film are adapted from director Alex Crozier's stage production MILLENNIALS which focuses on the aforementioned themes. Fourteen on-camera interviews that expound on the main topics were conducted with people of various ages, ethnicities, sexual orientations, and genders . The Millennial Experience seeks to uplift the voices of women, LGBTQIA+, and BIPOC communities in an effort to create a more equitable and just world.

programme.title: Culture Q
programme.desc: Culture Q is the world's first weekly queer-centric news series brought to you by the leading global queer streaming network, Revry. This innovative, weekly news series creatively features entertainment, pop culture, lifestyle and political news with wit and insightfully nuanced perspectives. Emphasizing the queer millieu, Culture Q stands to be the leading, weekly forum for boundary-pushing discussions and commentary. Hosted by digital news influencer pioneers, Shira Lazar and Andy Lalwani of the highly successful What's Trending, Culture Q will feature an ever-changing cavalcade of guests who help capture that X-factor which defines queer culture.

programme.title: Querencia
programme.desc: Teka has just broken up with her boyfriend and left home for the first time to follow her dream of becoming a dancer. The big city, and the big city talent she competes with at auditions, have left her feeling very lonely. Enter: dating apps. When Teka mistakenly selects "women seeking women" on her profile, she meets Abe, a struggling musician who needs to move on from her ex, which might just be the happiest of accidents.

programme.title: Her Story
programme.desc: S1 | Her Story is about two trans women in Los Angeles who have given up on love, when chance encounters give them hope. Violet is drawn to Allie, a reporter who approaches her for an interview. Career-driven Paige meets James, the first man she's considered opening up to in years. Will they risk letting what they are stand in the way of being loved for who they are? This is a story of complex characters who laugh, struggle, and grow, who share strength in sisterhood, who seek and find love. Her Story depicts the unique, complicated, and very human women we see in queer communities, and explores how these women navigate the intersections of label identity and love.

programme.title: TransMilitary
programme.desc: The 2018 SXSW Audience Award-winning feature film debut by Gabriel Silverman, Fiona Dawson, & Jamie Coughlin, TransMilitary follows the Emmy-nominated short film Transgender, at War and in Love. Around 15,500 transgender people serve in the U.S. military (notably the largest transgender employer in the U.S.), where they must conceal their gender identity because military policies ban their service. TransMilitary chronicles the lives of four individuals (Senior Airman Logan Ireland, Corporal Laila Villanueva, Captain Jennifer Peace & First Lieutenant El Cook) defending their country's freedom while fighting for their own. They put their careers and their families' livelihoods on the line by coming out as transgender to top brass officials in the Pentagon in hopes of attaining the equal right to serve. The ban was lifted in 2016, but with President Trump now trying to reinstate it, their futures hang in the balance once again.

programme.title: Ma Ma
programme.desc: Penélope Cruz delivers an extraordinarily emotional performance in ma ma, the newest film from acclaimed director Julio Medem. Honoring the high melodrama of Pedro Almodóvar and Douglas Sirk, Ma Ma follows Magda as she experiences tragedies and miracles alike. Just as Magda is diagnosed with breast cancer, she meets Arturo, a devoted husband and father in the midst of unspeakable loss. Their chance encounter leads both down a path of strength, grace, love, and rebirth.

programme.desc: The murder of an eccentric millionaire was not entirely unexpected, he flaunted his wealth and cared little for personal security. The evidence at the crime seemed to indicate robbery, but investigators wondered if there was something more.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A college student was found dead, and the evidence suggested he knew his killer. Three hairs and some microscopic cells helped police to unravel a web of lies, and find the motive for murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In an affluent suburb of Philadelphia, police were called to the scene of what appeared to be an accidental drowning. The investigation gradually focused on one person, a suspect who had more than a million reasons to want the victim dead.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When two women from the same town were murdered in the same way, police feared a serial killer was on the loose. At first they thought the victims had nothing in common until they found tiny clues linking them to the same man.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A teenager went missing after an evening of horseback riding. Her body was found a month later, three miles from her home. The killer unknowingly left trace evidence behind - tiny but unmistakable clues which pointed to him and him alone.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: North American Whitetail:Gordon's Favorite Hunts

programme.title: Florida Sportsman Best Boat:Ranger 2260 Bay, Grady 251 CE, Glasstream 360 SCX

If so, we'll be taking a look at the Grady White 251 Coastal Explorer Looking for a FAST boat that delivers style, function and fishability? If so, we'll be taking a look at Glasstream 360 SCX.

programme.title: Florida Sportsman Project Dreamboat:43 L&H Underway Classic 23 Seacraft Splash

programme.title: Chicken and Cornbread
programme.desc: Test cook Natalie Estrada prepares Cast Iron Baked Chicken with host Bridget Lancaster. Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges host Julia Collin Davison to a tasting of hot sauce. Finally, test cook Ashley Moore shows Julia how to make foolproof Blueberry Cornbread with Honey Butter.

programme.title: Roast Beef and Potatoes
programme.desc: Test cook Natalie Estrada reveals the secrets to making a foolproof Classic Roast Beef Tenderloin with host Bridget Lancaster. Next, host Julia Collin Davison discovers equipment expert Adam Ried's top pick of tongs. Finally, test cook Lawman Johnson shows Julia how to make perfect Lyonnaise Potatoes.

programme.title: The Italian American Kitchen
programme.desc: Test cook Ashley Moore reveals the secrets to achieving the ultimate Sausage Ragu in a time crunch. Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges host Bridget Lancaster to a fettuccine taste test. And finally, test cook Bryan Roof teaches host Julia Collin Davison how to make a spectacular Fluffy Baked Polenta with Red Sauce.

programme.title: Pork and Pierogi
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster prepare a show-stopping special occasion Cider-Braised Pork Roast. Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a sauerkraut tasting. Finally, test cook Bryan Roof teaches host Julia Collin Davison the secrets to tackling authentic Pittsburgh-style Potato-Cheddar Pierogi at home.

programme.title: A Trip to Tarheel Country
programme.desc: Test cook Bryan Roof shows host Julia Collin Davison a top-secret recipe for North Carolina Dipped Fried Chicken. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges host Bridget Lancaster to a tasting of chocolate ice cream. And finally, test cook Ashley Moore makes Bridget a classic version of North Carolina Lemon Pie.

programme.title: Ballpark Classics
programme.desc: Hosts Bridget Lancaster and Julia Collin Davison grill up Sausage and Peppers. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Julia to a tasting of whole-wheat sandwich bread. Next, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews disposable plates. And finally, test cook Christie Morrison makes Julia the best Ballpark Pretzels.

programme.title: Seafood Supper
programme.desc: Host Julia Collin Davison reveals the steps for making perfect Pan-Seared Salmon. Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop conducts a tasting of fish sauce. Then, science expert Dan Souza demonstrates the differences between wild and farmed salmon. Finally, test cook Elle Simone shows Julia the secrets to making the ultimate Shrimp Scampi.

programme.title: Cast Iron Staples
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster debunk cast iron myths and share the basics for cast iron care. Then, Julia shows Bridget how to make the ultimate Cast Iron Steak. Next, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews paper towel holders in the Equipment Corner. And finally, test cook Dan Souza uncovers the secrets to Crisp Roast Butterflied Chicken with Rosemary and Garlic.

programme.title: Tamales and Tacos
programme.desc: Hosts Bridget Lancaster and Julia Collin Davison prepare tamales with a red chile-chicken filling. Finally, test cook Dan Souza makes Julia chorizo and potato tacos.

programme.title: Cornish Hens and Pita on the Grill
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster prepare gai yang. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop conducts a tasting of tahini. Next, gadget critic Lisa McManus reviews grill tongs. And finally, test cook Dan Souza makes Bridget arayes.

programme.title: The Perfect Cake
programme.desc: Bridget and Julia make the perfect Gingerbread Layer Cake and Keith Makes Sticky Toffee Pudding Cakes.

programme.title: A Taste of Brazil
programme.desc: In this episode, test cook Becky Hays makes Julia moqueca. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of Pecorino Romano. Science expert Dan Souza discusses the importance of taking your time when you make an emulsion. Finally, Julia and Bridget prepare pão de queijo.

programme.title: Pasta Quick and Easy
programme.desc: Every cook needs quick pasta recipes in their repertoire. Pasta with garlic and oil is perhaps the most famous quick pasta dish. It starts with ingredients on hand-garlic, good olive oil, hot red pepper flakes-and turns them into something special and uncommonly good.

programme.title: Hearty Soups
programme.desc: On a cold day, few dishes are as comforting as a hearty soup-unless it turns out starchy or gluey. Watch as we make thick and creamy versions of two of our favorites: ham and split pea, and rustic potato-leek.

programme.title: The Pancakes Show
programme.desc: Few recipes deliver so much pleasure for so little work as pancakes. The batter comes together in minutes, and the cooking time is brief. Why, then, do most Americans never make pancakes from scratch?

programme.title: Easy Sheet Cakes
programme.desc: A sheet cake is like a two-layer cake with training wheels-it's hard to fall off. But sheet cakes are still cakes. They can still turn out dry, sticky, or flavorless, and on occasion they can even sink in the middle. The test kitchen decided to tackle two popular sheet cakes-carrot and chocolate-and produce simple recipes that would deliver superior results.

programme.title: An Indian Dinner
programme.desc: The test kitchen prepares two Indian favorites: chicken biryani and mulligatawny soup.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table - Summer Evening Party
programme.desc: It’s the end of a great week in San Miguel, so Pati and her family decide to have a summer evening party – the perfect end to a fun family vacation. First, she’ll head to a few places in San Miguel for ingredients, Agropark and a local winery. Back home she’ll cook a big, celebatory family dinner to be enjoyed on their patio, while the sun sets over the city.

programme.title: From Scratch - Whole Hog
programme.desc: Today, Chef Joe visits a rum distillery and celebrates his birthday by roasting a whole pig.

programme.title: A Taste of History - Recipes in the Rainforest
programme.desc: The natural beauty and unique foods of St. Lucia are explored. Chef Walter Staib learns some native creole language and helps prepare unique and traditional St. Lucian fare in the tropical forest of this island nation.

programme.title: Chefs A' Field: Green Cuisine - Blueberry Bombshells
programme.desc: Portland, Oregon’s natural bounty is on display at the restaurants of famed chef Vitaly Paley. Chef finds himself in the Cascade foothills in search of the perfect berry. We learn about all varieties of blueberries and even get a chance to mingle with the resident falcon on patrol.Then its into the kitchen to create several dishes where the Northwest blueberry plays starring role.

programme.title: Kimchi Chronicles - The Noodle and Dumpling Chronicles
programme.desc: Like an Italian with a bowl of spaghetti or tortellini, a Korean eating a heap of noodles or dumplings is a satisfied customer. In Korea, slurping is not only permitted, it’s considered a compliment to the cook. This episode features a restaurant in Seoul known for its nenngymyun, an unusual dish of elastic buckwheat noodles served with ice-cold beef broth.

programme.title: Chefs A' Field: Green Cuisine - King of Alaska
programme.desc: The mighty Yukon River is the longest river in Alaska and the third longest in North America. Its 2300‐mile stretch of pristine glacier‐fed waters holds the most legendary and mystical salmon in the world‐ the Yukon River King Salmon. In this episode, master seafood chef Rick Moonen ventures to this remote region to meet what he calls, “The best fish I ever ate.”

programme.title: Martin Yan's Chinatowns - The Fishing Village
programme.desc: Martin calls on the fishermen in the Coloane Village on Macau and feasts on the fruit of their labour including a unique “Hanging Fish”. This episode's recipes include: Shanghainese Wok-Seared Fish in Wine Sauce, Black Bean Sauce Clams with Fresh Basil, and Cracked Crab in Ginger-Wine Sauce.

programme.title: Kimchi Chronicles - The Chicken Chronicles
programme.desc: Beginning in Andong, the spiritual capital of Korea, Marja participates in the area’s festive masked dance ritual and learns about the local salted mackerel before getting into jjimtak, Andong’s real knockout speciality. Along Chicken Alley, Marja and her adopted cousin April sample tons of the spicy stir-fry made with chicken, noodles and vegetables.

programme.title: Martin Yan's Chinatowns - The Fishing Village

programme.desc: Recipes included with this episode: Steamed Clams in Wasabi Broth with Key Lim, Sauteed Fillet of Walleye with Tomatoes, and Almond and Pear Tart. Restaurants include: Pacific Time in Miami, Dakota Bar & Grill in St. Paul, and Peristyle in New Orleans.

programme.title: Vintage Tech Hunters - Bohus and Shaun…Talk to Gorgar
programme.desc: Bohus and Shaun take Gorgar, the world's first talking pinball machine, to Dallas to have it restored. While in Texas, they unearth some rare vintage tech at a swap meet and hunt for deals at a liquidation sale.

programme.title: Vintage Tech Hunters - Bohus and Shaun…Buy Space Pants
programme.desc: Bohus and Shaun travel to Dallas to attend an auction of rare space memorabilia. They're on a mission to buy a rare bit of tech from the last tragic mission of the Space Shuttle Colombia. On the way to the auction, they hit up as many flea markets and collections as they can.

programme.title: Vintage Tech Hunters - Bohus and Shaun…Go Berserk
programme.desc: Bohus and Shaun set out across Illinois in search of vintage coin operated tech. They manage to charm their way into the SanFlillipo estate - a collection of rare turn-of-the-century tech - to buy some rare museum quality coin op machines. They also discover a treasure trove of 1980's arcade games in a small Illinois town.

programme.title: Vintage Tech Hunters - Bohus and Shaun…Race Slot Cars
programme.desc: On a road trip in Illinois, Bohus and Shaun find a rare vintage slot car kit at a local flea market. The guys head to a local slot car track to look for more vintage cars and experience the long forgotten sport for themselves.

programme.title: Vintage Tech Hunters - Bohus and Shaun…Drive a Microcar
programme.desc: On their way to Atlanta, Bohus and Shaun explore the Dixie Yard Sale - a 90 mile long yard sale along Georgia's Dixie Highway. After finding some great vintage tech, they hunt through a multi-million dollar private collection that includes some rare, mint-condition microcars.

programme.title: Vintage Tech Hunters - Bohus and Shaun…Put the Pedal to the Metal
programme.desc: On a road trip in Southern Ontario, Bohus and Shaun unearth a Sinclair C5 - a rare British electric car rarely seen in North America. While waiting to have it repaired, they find some other unexpected finds in rural Ontario.

programme.title: Chasing The Sun: Asia - Hong Kong

programme.title: Chasing The Sun: Asia - Vietnam
programme.desc: Stephen immerses himself in local culture, learning about generations worth of traditions from barber shops to mask-making.

programme.title: Chasing The Sun: Asia - Bali

programme.title: Chasing The Sun: Asia - India
programme.desc: From an indie musician in Mumbai to a skate community rallying together to help local children, Stephen finds the personal stories of art and perseverance in a community of 1.3 billion people.

programme.desc: Putting to the test all his muscles including scalp and tongue, Harry must balance a bowl of burning oil on his head while making a mockery of himself in a Sichuan opera.

programme.title: Tiny House Nation:400 Sq. Ft. Wine Tasting House

programme.title: Lexington Colonial | Colonial Curb Appeal
programme.desc: At the Lexington project, Kevin finds the front gable wall of the second floor up, and the roof framing underway. Around back, Tom installs a 24-foot long LVL to temporarily hold up the second floor while he adds new structure. Then, they frame the rest of the addition roof. Nearby in Lexington's historic district, architect Frank Shirley shows Norm how people have been using front porches to lend character and charm to Colonial style homes for hundreds of years. Back at our house, Tom shows Kevin the framing of our new farmer's porch and then they build a small overhang to extend the look across the garage. Inside, Kevin sees how the homeowners are getting by without a kitchen, which has been gutted and is ready to be expanded thanks to a 24-foot steel beam that will carry the weight of the second floor. Later, Tom presents a solution to the ceiling height challenge in the old part of the kitchen: a structural ceiling that will allow him to gain some height over the islands, while allowing for both adequate structure, and a clever chase for wiring.

programme.title: Lexington Colonial | Smart Solutions
programme.desc: Norm visits the Hancock-Clarke house to see where Paul Revere stopped to warn John Hancock and Samuel Adams of the advancing British troops during the start of the American Revolution. Kevin recaps how the roofers applied new architectural shingles to tie the old house in with the new addition. Tom shows Kevin the progress on the new back deck, and how the architect has called for a corner stair leading down to the backyard. The framing requires two sets of traditional stringer systems, joined in the middle by a hip stringer and a series of jack stringers the same idea as framing a hip roof. Kevin finds Richard and plumbing contractor Kevin Bilo fighting to keep the P-trap from the new bathtub on the second floor from interfering with the decorative ceiling of the new kitchen. They use a new German bath waste and overflow kit that allows for the flexibility needed to solve the problem. Kevin and Norm finish up the trim and decking on the new corner deck stair. For the ipe deckboards that are sharply mitered in the corner, Norm has settled on using a floating tenon connection to prevent them from opening up over time

programme.title: Lexington Colonial | Making Connections
programme.desc: Roger meets landscape designer Tim Lee to see how the small stream in the backyard affects all other areas of the yard, including a patch of grass that has to be returned to the wild, and a stand of trees out front that can now be removed after careful consideration by the Conservation Commission. Before the trees come down, Roger shows Kevin the valuable shade plants that could be damaged in the process, so they're relocated to a new bed in the side yard to provide screening from the neighboring house. Tom and Kevin cut away a five-foot section of wall to connect the new kitchen to the old great room. Richard shows Kevin two common rough plumbing conditions in the kitchen: a main sink that has a traditional drain and vent configuration, and an island prep sink, which requires a bow vent in order to work properly. Kevin meets building inspector Fred Lonardo to learn how a GC can call for a "partial framing inspection" to keep progress moving on a job, as in the case with our front porch. Arborist John Marquis shows Roger the proper preparation, safety precautions, and procedures for doing a "take down" of the 12 trees in the front yard.

programme.title: Lexington Colonial | Exterior Details
programme.desc: Tom shows Kevin the new mudroom door and the work required to patch in new clapboards to match the old around it. Inside, two weeks of rough electrical is coming to a close as the subs call for their inspection. Kevin meets electrician Allen Gallant and inspector Alix Berube to see what goes into a rough electrical inspection. At the back deck, Tom shows Kevin how he's using a hybrid railing system that has cedar posts and railing caps, with stainless steel cable "balusters". Kevin visits kitchen designer Donna Venegas at her showroom at Boston's Design Center to see the neutrals, textures, and metallics that are currently trending in kitchens. Then, project designer Michele Kelly and homeowner Jeremy Kieval show Kevin the layout and design choices for the new family kitchen. With a house from 1966, almost anything goes, so paint color expert Bonnie Krims gives Kevin and homeowner Jody Kieval a range of options for the exterior colors

programme.title: Lexington Colonial | Inspections
programme.desc: Norm and Tom install reinforced fiberglass columns to support the new farmer's porch. Richard meets plumbing contractor Brian Bilo and local plumbing inspector Donald "Duke" LaConte to see what he's looking for at our rough plumbing inspection. Kevin and Tom meet building commissioner Fred Lonardo to see what goes into the rough mechanical and rough framing inspections. After Fred signs off, insulation begins. Tom shows Kevin the storm window system he's using to enclose the screen porch, and Russell Parrot shows how we're going to heat the space: with electric radiant floor heat. Norm and Tom welcome back Fred Lonardo to review the various ways we can achieve the insulation value we need in our walls to meet code.

programme.title: Lexington Colonial | Conservation Concerns
programme.desc: Kevin drives up to find gutter fabricator Mike Vidulich installing a one-piece covered gutter that should never have to be cleaned. In the backyard, Roger shows Kevin the native plants he's using to turn a patch of lawn back to nature, as required by the local Conservation Commission. Master electrician Allen Gallant shows Kevin the existing aluminum wiring in the old part of the house and how he's safely working with it to update the recessed light fixtures and add new sconces over the mantel. Norm visits a factory in Londonderry, NH to see how they're making and testing two types of windows for our project. Roger shows Kevin the last piece of the Conservation puzzle, the infiltration system that is going to disperse the water from our gutters into the ground

programme.title: Lexington Colonial | Old to New
programme.desc: Norm arrives and recaps progress on mudroom and kitchen, and finds tile contractor Mark Ferrante installing a porcelain plank floor tile that is made to look like wood. He's using it on both the treads and risers of the stairs to the garage. Master electrician Allen Gallant shows Kevin how to properly abandon an old electrical box, and how to fish wires to a new one. Then, in the adjacent great room, Kevin shows how to patch in the huge holes where the old recessed lights were: rigid insulation, strapping, wallboard and plaster. In the backyard, painting contractor Mauro Henrique shows Norm a smart and efficient way to paint shutters. With a blank slate in the basement, Richard shows Kevin the thinking that goes into the logical layout of a mechanical room.ŒåäóæTom shows Kevin how he's turning an arched doorway into one that's squared off to match the rest of the openings on the first floor.

programme.title: Lexington Colonial | Designer Details
programme.desc: Kevin arrives to find the second floor sanded, stained and sealed, and finds Tom overseeing the crew as they start on the first floor, turning the bleached out red oak floors to a dark walnut color. In the kitchen, the cabinets are mostly installed, and carpenter Chuck Parker shows Norm the custom refrigerator panels and how he's properly mounting them to the refrigerator. In Lexington Center, just steps from the Battle Green, Kevin meets local designer Robin Gannon to see how she used her modern and eclectic style to decorate 22 rooms of a historic inn. In the temporary garage workshop, Norm shows Kevin how he's turning a chest of drawers into a sink base for the new powder room.

programme.title: Lexington Colonial | New Walk, Old Stone
programme.desc: Kevin arrives to find Roger starting on the new bluestone front walk despite some significant grade challenges. Around back, Norm finds tile contractor Mark Ferrante installing porcelain tile made to look like slate in the screen porch. Kevin recaps the vanity project and meets Richard to see the sink and faucet set. Nearby in Acton, MA, Roger visits a stone salvage yard to see how Gavin Johnston is selecting and fabricating antique granite for the front walk and custom house marker. At the end of the day, Kevin sees the granite steps in place and lends a hand as Roger sets the house marker

programme.title: Lexington Colonial | Mudroom, Ventilation, Kids' Rooms
programme.desc: Master electrician Allen Gallant shows Kevin the new LED ribbon strip lights he's using under the cabinets in the kitchen and butler's pantry. Norm and Tom build the new mudroom storage system, focusing on the darkly stained maple top and the rail and stile doors and panels. Richard and Tom review the critical need for ventilation in our modern, super insulated buildings. Wallpaper hanger Mark Pehrson shows Kevin his technique for applying wallpaper to a ceiling in one of the girl's rooms. In another daughter's bedroom, Kevin finds painting contractor Mauro Henrique setting up to paint decorative stripes on an accent wall.

programme.title: Lexington Colonial | Finishing Details
programme.desc: Kevin arrives to find Roger and landscape designer Tim Lee placing the first new plants in the planting plan. The rest will be installed over time by the homeowners. Richard shows Kevin how he's using two kinds of radiators to bring heat to the garage, and the upstairs sitting room. Installer Bob Young shows Norm the new insulated steel garage doors that should help keep the heat inside the garage. Tom shows Kevin the progress on the upstairs laundry room that is outfitted with simple cabinets and a small countertop. In the great room, master electrician Allen Gallant shows Kevin how he's installing a massive wrought-iron chandelier with 52 bulbs.

programme.title: The Veteran's Special House Project | The Veteran's Special House Project
programme.desc: Over three special episodes, This Old House is partnering with Homes For Our Troops (HFOT) to build a houseäó_í‹í¬from the ground upäó_í‹í¬for one Army veteran and his family, as a way to highlight the heroes who have given so much for their country. In 2003, while on his first deployment to Iraq, SSG Matt Dewitt and his battalion came under attack, leaving Matt with devastating injuries that resulted in the amputation of both arms. We meet Matt and his family at his current home to understand the challenges of day-to-day and why a HFOT specially adapted home will be life changing. Kevin meets Buildings Project Manager Mike Duckett in Hopkinton, NH to see the plans for the DeWitt project. Norm, Tom and Kevin join builder Ken Dionne and his team to help with framing the exterior walls. Kevin meets the HFOT Chairman, Four Star General Richard Cody, to understand their mission. Kevin then travels to Florida to meet Justin Gaertner, another veteran who also received a specially adapted home from HFOT. Kevin rejoins the project in New Hampshire and finds that all the exterior walls are secured and the truss roof is going up.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Pass Through, New Gate
programme.desc: The thirteenth season of Ask This Old House begins with Richard showing Kevin some solutions for dealing with rust staining. Tom opens up a small home by installing a pass through in a load-bearing wall. Roger replaces a poorly built fence gate with one that will last. And the guys play "What Is It" with special guest NASA Astronaut Rick Mastracchio.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Pass Through, New Gate
programme.desc: The thirteenth season of Ask This Old House begins with Richard showing Kevin some solutions for dealing with rust staining. Tom opens up a small home by installing a pass through in a load-bearing wall. Roger replaces a poorly built fence gate with one that will last. programme.title: Ask TOH | Citrus Greening, Tile
programme.desc: Roger heads to Florida to learn about Citrus Greening, a disease that's killing citrus trees across the state. Tom replaces an old vinyl peel-and-stick floor with ceramic tile. And the guys ask ""What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | Front Door, Faucet Fix
programme.desc: Roger educates Kevin on beneficial insects. Tom resizes a front door that gets stuck on carpet every time it opens. Richard repairs an outdoor garden faucet. And the guys ask ""What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | Special Drought Show
programme.desc: In this special episode, the guys tackle practical solutions for drought. Kevin and Richard tour Lake Mead, the largest reservoir in the country. Roger visits Las Vegas to replace a water-guzzling lawn. Kevin meets with Meteorologist Jim Cantore to hear cautionary tales from the front lines of the drought. And Richard travels to San Francisco to replace an old-fashioned toilet.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Beam Fix, New Switch
programme.desc: Tom teaches a homeowner how to repair some structural problems in his home. Electrician Scott Caron helps a homeowner run wiring for a new ceiling fixture and switch in a living room. And the guys ask, ""What is it?"

programme.desc: Take aim with the Cajun Pawn Stars.

programme.title: American Pickers:They Boldly Go
programme.desc: Mike and Frank are out in the Kentucky on a different kind of mission.

programme.title: American Pickers:The Possum Trot
programme.desc: While cruising through South Carolina, looking for leads.

programme.title: American Pickers:Keep Out!
programme.desc: Mike and Frank are brushing up on their Southern expressions.

programme.title: American Pickers:Too Hot To Handle
programme.desc: In upstate New York, the guys stop in at a sprawling treasure-laden farm.

programme.title: Cajun Pawn Stars:Fire Sale
programme.desc: Sound the alarms as the Cajun Pawn Stars race to check out a 1975 Mac Fire Truck.

programme.title: Cajun Pawn Stars:Double-Edged Pawn
programme.desc: Join the Cajun Pawn Stars as they unsheathe a pair of Union Civil War swords.

programme.title: Appalachian Outlaws:Snakes and a Plane
programme.desc: Tony Coffman has one more day to deliver his midseason total of 1,000 pounds.

programme.title: Appalachian Outlaws:The Devil You Know
programme.desc: The rules have changed and Mr. Lee is demanding weekly ginseng deliveries.

programme.title: Mountain Men:Bloody Sunday
programme.desc: Logger turned Mountain Man, Charlie Tucker's luck takes a turn for the worse.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Bridezillas:Leap or Die Frying
programme.desc: Blanca exposes Julian's dark secret, shocking the house. Couples are forced to make the ultimate sacrifice and jump two-stories from a burning building.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Bridezillas:The Lie Detector
programme.desc: Devastating lies are revealed when couples undergo a lie detector test. Julian is blindsided by Blanca's deception and destroys the house in a booze fueled rage. Shawn falls off the wagon.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Bridezillas:Proposal or Disposal
programme.desc: The entire house erupts into a brawl after Shawn returns to the mansion drunk. Gloria pulls a knife and Sofia breaks her foot in the melee. The final ring ceremony is held and not every marriage survives.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Bridezillas:The Aftermath
programme.desc: Couples clash at an explosive reunion where a sex tape scandal, a shocking arrest and a surprise divorce are revealed. Special guest Traci Braxton dishes on the new season of Marriage Boot Camp Reality Stars.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Bridezillas:Secrets Revealed
programme.desc: Jim and Elizabeth Carroll take viewers behind the scenes and reveal shocking secrets and never-before-seen footage from this season of Marriage Boot Camp.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Bridezillas:Meet the Couples
programme.desc: Catch up with Bridezilla couples on the brink of divorce- Tasha & Jeff, Blanca & Julian, Mai-Lee & Tomas, Sofia & Shaun and Gloria & Mark. From a sexless marriage to a wife that still competes with an ex.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Bridezillas:Booze and Breakdowns
programme.desc: Five explosive Bridezillas and their husbands, with marriages on the brink of divorce, arrive at Marriage Boot Camp. Dirty laundry is exposed and an alcohol fueled fight sparks a midnight standoff.

programme.title: My Fair Wedding:Bayyina Joseph
programme.desc: By David Tutera's standards, Bayyina's idea of a "majestic" wedding falls a tad bit short. A wedding dress inspired by Madonna's "Like A Virgin" video? A reception hall that looks like a 70's rollerskating rink?

programme.title: My Fair Wedding:"Merlot Bride" Kricket
programme.desc: Kristi's wedding is based around pink merlot, her favorite wine. When David Tutera meets Kristi, he is dismayed to find an assortment of fake flowers, leaves and grapes that does little to enhance her theme.

programme.title: My Fair Wedding:"Discount Store Bride" Quiana
programme.desc: When David Tutera met Quiana Morgan, he found out that she wanted a "winter wonderland themed" wedding...in the spring! Now, David sets out to change everything about Quiana's wedding - including the season!

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars:Drama Said Knock You Out
programme.desc: An epic rap battle exposes the couples' shocking resentment issues. Kurupt's struggle with self-control leads to an epic fail that stuns the house & could end his relationship. Hazel-E & Tahiry face off.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars:Swap It Like It's Hot
programme.desc: Jealousy strikes when the Boot Campers break out their sexiest dance moves. An explosive fight rocks the house, pushing Judge Toler to erupt in disappointment. A shocking health scare threatens a couple.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars:Pod Clash
programme.desc: The couples are divided during a podcast when hip-hop heavyweight Clinton Sparks gets the Boot Campers to spill tea about their partners. Tahiry learns a dark secret about Vado. Tempers flare when Hazel-E thinks De'von is only in it for the clout.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars:Hard Shock Life
programme.desc: Boot campers battle with communication issues when they can't escape a drill. Willie's surprising confession stuns Shanda. Shock therapy triggers the couples when hard truths are exposed. Vado's shocking meltdown turns the house upside down.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars:Luv Ya Self
programme.desc: Vado's shocking outburst rocks the house and forces Dr. Ish to make a difficult decision. When the couples reveal their deepest insecurities, it leads to surprising breakthroughs. Toni's devastating discovery threatens her relationship with Kurupt.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars:Talk Dirty to Me
programme.desc: The Boot Campers spill their shocking sex secrets & flip the house upside down. Dr. Ish makes a decision that stuns the couples. Kurupt's behavior pushes Toni to a breaking point. A trip to the hospital results in a devastating discovery.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars:Break the Cycle
programme.desc: The Boot Campers confront their past & expose shocking childhood traumas. Tahiry struggles with Vado's return to the house. When Kurupt reaches a breaking point, Dr. Ish and Judge Toler make a difficult decision.

programme.title: Shannen Says:Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Shannen Doherty and fiance Kurt Iswarienko plan to marry in seven weeks. Shannen realizes she can't plan alone and hires wedding planner David Tutera to help execute the wedding of her dreams.

programme.title: Shannen Says:Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Shannen and David discuss her vision for the wedding day. Shannen is dismayed to find that her wedding venue isn't exactly perfect. Kurt volunteers Shannen and himself to baby-sit her manager's son.

programme.title: Shannen Says:Shannen's Ready, Is Kurt?
programme.desc: David finds a solution for Shannen's wedding venue. Shannen looks for wedding dresses and decides to wear three, while her business managers put her on an allowance.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 14 Chefs Compete" - The season's first challenge finds the contestants slicing halibut into thin six-ounce fillets. One member of each team must serve as maître d' during the dining service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 13 Chefs Compete" - After chickens wake them up in their living quarters, the contestants must pluck what once clucked, then cook them for the evening's family-style dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 12 Chefs Compete" - The two teams compete to make the most pasta for the evening's dinner service, and a kitchen accident puts one contestant in the hospital.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 11 Chefs Compete" - The first challenge for the remaining eleven chefs: make a gourmet pizza. The winners enjoy gourmet burgers in Santa Barbara while the losers prepare for the night's dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 10 Chefs Compete" - The ten remaining chefs must please a picky teen who has come to Hell's Kitchen for her birthday party. The team that designs the best menu wins a teen-themed treat.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 9 Chefs Compete" - Chef Ramsay makes the nine remaining chefs take a blindfolded taste test. The winners get to go to a spa the losers must clean the dorm.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 8 Chefs Compete" - Chef Ramsay asks for a volunteer to switch sides. The group dynamic changes as the teams face their next challenge: creating four dishes using twenty specific ingredients.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 7 Chefs Compete" - In the opening challenge, the two teams compete in a relay race. The winners earn surfing lessons while the losers must clean Hell's Kitchen from top to bottom.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 6 Chefs Compete" - Chef Ramsay inspires the six contestants by taking them to the restaurant that this season's winner will run. Season three winner Rock Harper makes a guest appearance.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 5 Chefs Compete" - Chef Ramsay orders the five remaining chefs to teach cooking-impaired housewives to prepare a gourmet meal. The winner receives culinary pointers from chefs Mark Peel and Ben Ford.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 4 Chefs Compete" - The final four contestants prepare lunch for surprise guests: eighty picky pregnant moms. The chef whose dish they favor wins a $1,000 shopping spree. The others must clean up.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Nino's Italian Restaurant
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay travels to Long Beach, California to visit Nino's Italian Restaurant, where ownership has changed hands from a pleasant immigrant couple to their obnoxious son.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Revisited No. 5
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay returns to Lido di Manhattan, Anna Vincenzo's and Le Bistro to see if the owners have implemented his changes.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Pantaleone's
programme.desc: A Denver restaurant owner maintains that his pizza is the best in the city, but local residents actually prefer store-bought pies.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Mangia Mangia (Part One)
programme.desc: An Italian restaurant in Woodland Park, Colorado is beset with problems, including an incompetent head chef and low morale among the staff.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Mangia Mangia (Part Two)
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay suggests a few top-down changes to help Mangia Mangia survive.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Giuseppe's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay makes his way to Macomb Township, Michigan to inspect Giuseppe's, a family-run Italian restaurant afflicted with a bickering father-son duo and a shortage of customers.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Fiesta Sunrise
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay helps out a family-run Mexican restaurant called Fiesta Sunrise — which is in deep financial trouble and extremely dirty. Can Ramsay get the family on the path to success?

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Mama Rita's
programme.desc: Ramsay finds that the Mexican eatery Mama Rita's suffers from a disorganized kitchen. Meanwhile, the owner may have to sacrifice a friendship in order to save her business.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Revisited No. 6
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay returns to Classic American, DownCity and Davide to offer more advice and gauge the restaurants' progress — or lack thereof.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Barefoot Bob's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay stops by Barefoot Bob's, a beachfront restaurant in Massachusetts that's owned by a couple whose marriage is fraying.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Seascape
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay must work with a hard-headed chef and inexperienced owners to make some changes and bring customers back to Seascape.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Back to New York" - The designers size up the new competition when they meet up for the quintessential rooftop toast with Heidi and Tim in NYC. Tim presents the designers with their challenge during a field trip to Central Park. The pressure is on as the designers must work against the clock to wow Heidi, Michael, Nina, and guest judge Nicole Richie.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "The Fashion Farm" - The designers are taken out of the city and onto a farm. There, they are put to the test to see how innovative they can be when presented with an unusual fabric choice.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "The Hi's and Low's of Fashion" - The designers butt heads when they have to work in teams of two. As personalities clash in the workroom, tensions come to a head on the Runway.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Design Your Heart Out" - In this episode, the designers are challenged to create a signature dress for the Campbell's "AdDRESS Your Heart" program.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Run for Cover" - The bar is raised when the remaining designers get one of the biggest challenges in Project Runway history that comes with an unprecedented prize at stake. Big personalities begin to upset the temperature in the workroom.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "A Little Bit of Fashion" - It's anything but child's play as the designers dig into the depths of their creativity for their "mini" challenge. But which designers will be triumphant on the runway, and which will be crying for their mommies?

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Hard Wear" - The designers strap on their "tool belts" to show off their "construction" skills. But as they prepare for the Runway, each designer fears they may end up in the bottom.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "The Elements of Fashion" - The designers have to use the four elements as inspiration for their garments. But which designers will drown with their water-inspired looks or go up in flames with their fire-inspired ones?

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Takin' it to the Street" - The designers look to four NYC neighborhoods for inspiration in their next Team Challenge. One designer's partner choice leads to a contentious team paring.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Hey, That's My Fabric" - The designers are asked to create their own fabric as the basis for their looks.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Sew Much Pressure" - One designer's surprise announcement leads to another designer's second chance. Reeling from the shocking news, the designers have to compose themselves as they design a red carpet garment for a tough, opinionated celebrity.
